Package component.components.eventCard

Class EventCard

java.lang.Object
component.base.BasicStoryComponent
component.components.eventCard.EventCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Savable, SavableAsJSONObject<BasicStoryComponent>, java.lang.Comparable<EventCard>
public class EventCard
extends BasicStoryComponent
implements java.lang.Comparable<EventCard>
An instance of BasicStoryComponent. An event card represents an event or scene in the story.
See Also:
EventCardList

    • EventCard

      public EventCard​(java.lang.String componentID)
      Constructor for EventCard that requires componentID. All fields are set to default values. Used to populate HashMap during file opening process.
      Parameters:
      componentID - this eventCard's unique ID.

  • Method Details

    • readJSONObjectAsComponentID

      public static EventCard readJSONObjectAsComponentID​(org.json.simple.JSONObject componentObject)
      Accepts a JSONObject with a componentID field, and gets an eventCard from that componentID.
      Parameters:
      componentObject - the JSONObject that is to be read.
      Returns:
      an eventCard with data loaded from the eventCard referenced by the JSONObject's componentID.

      • Color of cardTitleContainer.
      Overrides:
      setColorAndDisplay in class BasicStoryComponent
      Parameters:
      color - the color to be set.

    • setTimePeriodAndDisplay

      public void setTimePeriodAndDisplay​(TimePeriod timePeriod)
      Sets timePeriod value and everything related to display of event card's color. This consists of:
      • Text displaying date and time.
      The timePeriod of chapter and storyline is also reset accordingly.
      Overrides:
      setTimePeriodAndDisplay in class BasicStoryComponent
      Parameters:
      timePeriod - the timePeriod to be set.

    • setSelfComponentTimePeriod

      public void setSelfComponentTimePeriod​(TimePeriod timePeriod, BasicStoryComponent component)
      Resets timePeriod of chapter and storyline this event card is in. according to the event card's timePeriod.
      Parameters:
      timePeriod - the timePeriod to be set.
      component - the component whose timePeriod is to be reset.

    • setStorylineAndDisplay

      public void setStorylineAndDisplay​(Storyline storyline)
      Sets storyline value and everything related to display of event card's storyline. This consists of:
      • Color of this event card.
      Parameters:
      storyline - the storyline to be set.

    • setChapterAndDisplay

      public void setChapterAndDisplay​(Chapter chapter)
      Sets chapter value and everything related to display of event card's chapter. This consists of:
      • Color of this event card's chapterTitleContainer. If null, color is set to white.
      Parameters:
      chapter - the chapter to be set.

    • setChapterTitleAndDisplay

      public void setChapterTitleAndDisplay​(java.lang.String title)
      Sets title value of chapter and everything related to display of title of this event card's chapter. This consists of:
      • Text on chapterTitle.
      Parameters:
      title - the title to be set.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo​(EventCard o) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Defines how eventCards are to be compared. EventCards are compared by comparing their timePeriods.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<EventCard>
      Parameters:
      o - the other eventCard compared to this eventCard.
      Returns:
      the result of comparing their timePeriods.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Illegal argument used to invoke a method.

    • writeJSONObject

      public org.json.simple.JSONObject writeJSONObject()
      Converts an eventCard into a JSONObject.
      Specified by:
      writeJSONObject in interface SavableAsJSONObject<BasicStoryComponent>
      Overrides:
      writeJSONObject in class BasicStoryComponent
      Returns:
      the passed eventCard, in JSONObject form.

    • readJSONObject

      public EventCard readJSONObject​(org.json.simple.JSONObject eventCardObject)
      Loads data in the JSONObject into an eventCard.
      Specified by:
      readJSONObject in interface SavableAsJSONObject<BasicStoryComponent>
      Overrides:
      readJSONObject in class BasicStoryComponent
      Parameters:
      eventCardObject - the JSONObject that is to be read.
      Returns:
      an eventCard with data loaded from the eventCardObject parameter.

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem()
      Removes this event card from the document.
      Overrides:
      removeItem in class BasicStoryComponent

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      FXML initialize method, called after EventCard.fxml finishes loading. Does the following:
      1. Sets display of all fields.
      2. Setups context menu to display when right clicked, and hide when clicked elsewhere.
      3. Setups event card drag-drop.
      4. Setups card title, description, and chapter name to be editable when clicked.
